sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; interface DomainDetailScreenProps { onBack: () => void; domain?: string; } interface DomainData { id: string; name: string; icon: string; description: string; observedSkills: number; totalSkills: number; subdomains: string[]; lastNewSkill?: { name: string; date: string; }; } interface SkillData { id: string; name: string; domain: string; subdomain: string; ageRange: string; description: string; status: 'observed' | 'emerging' | 'not-yet' | 'not-applicable'; dateObserved?: string; } const DomainDetailScreen: React.FC = ({ onBack, domain }) => { // State for modals and actions const [showAddSkillModal, setShowAddSkillModal] = useState(false); const [showExportModal, setShowExportModal] = useState(false); const [toastVisible, setToastVisible] = useState(false); const [toastMessage, setToastMessage] = useState(''); const [toastType, setToastType] = useState<'success' | 'error' | 'info'>('success'); // Mobile tab state const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState<'skills' | 'care-ideas' | 'progress'>('skills'); // Filter state const [selectedSubdomain, setSelectedSubdomain] = useState('all'); // Sample domain data - in real app this would come from props or API const domainData: DomainData = { id: domain || 'motor', name: domain === 'motor' ? 'Motor' : domain === 'communication' ? 'Communication' : domain === 'social-emotional' ? 'Social-Emotional' : domain === 'cognitive-play' ? 'Cognitive/Play' : domain === 'adaptive-self-help' ? 'Adaptive/Self-Help' : 'Motor', icon: domain === 'motor' ? 'ðŸƒ' : domain === 'communication' ? 'ðŸ’¬' : domain === 'social-emotional' ? 'ðŸ˜Š' : domain === 'cognitive-play' ? 'ðŸ§©' : domain === 'adaptive-self-help' ? 'ðŸ‘•' : 'ðŸƒ', description: 'Track skills and explore care ideas.', observedSkills: 3, totalSkills: 12, lastNewSkill: { name: 'Sits briefly without support', date: '2024-01-15' } }; const progressPercentage = Math.round((domainData.observedSkills / domainData.totalSkills) * 100); const showToast = (message: string, type: 'success' | 'error' | 'info' = 'success') => { setToastMessage(message); setToastType(type); setToastVisible(true); setTimeout(() => setToastVisible(false), 3000); }; const handleAddSkill = () => { setShowAddSkillModal(true); }; const handleExportReport = () => { setShowExportModal(true); }; const handleBack = () => { onBack(); }; return (
{/* Header */}
{/* Left side - Back button and title */}

{domainData.icon} {domainData.name}

{domainData.description}

{/* Right side - Actions */}
{/* Progress chip */}
{progressPercentage}%
{domainData.observedSkills} of {domainData.totalSkills} skills
{/* AI Suggestions button */} {/* Export button */} {/* Add Skill button */}
{/* Mobile Tab Navigation */}
{/* Main content */}
{/* Left column - Skills Checklist (70% on desktop) */}
{/* Mobile Skills Tab */}

Skills Checklist

Track observed skills in the {domainData.name} domain. Mark skills as observed, emerging, or not yet demonstrated.

{/* Placeholder for skills checklist */}

Rolls both ways

6-9 months

6-9 months

Observed

9-12 months

Emerging

Walks with support

9-12 months

{/* Mobile Care Ideas Tab */}

Care Ideas

Personalized suggestions to support {domainData.name} development.

{/* Placeholder for care ideas */}

Practice sitting balance

Place toys just out of reach to encourage reaching and balance.

Daily activity

Tummy time with toys

Encourage reaching and rolling with colorful toys.

3x per day
{/* Mobile Progress Tab */}

Progress Timeline

Track {domainData.name} development over time.

{/* Placeholder for progress timeline */}

Rolls both ways

Observed on Jan 15, 2024

Sits briefly without support

Observed on Jan 10, 2024

Pulls to stand

Emerging - first noticed Jan 20, 2024

{/* Right column - Care Ideas panel (30% on desktop, sticky) */}

Care Ideas

Personalized suggestions to support {domainData.name} development.

{/* Placeholder for care ideas */}

Practice sitting balance

Place toys just out of reach to encourage reaching and balance.

Daily activity

Tummy time with toys

Encourage reaching and rolling with colorful toys.

3x per day

Standing practice

Support under arms while standing at furniture.

2x per day
{/* Toast */} {toastVisible && (
{toastMessage}
)} {/* Placeholder modals */} {showAddSkillModal && (

Add Skill to {domainData.name}

This would open the same quick-add sheet from Phase 5A, pre-filtered to the {domainData.name} domain.

)} {showExportModal && (

Export {domainData.name} Report

This would open an export modal with the {domainData.name} domain pre-selected.

)}
); }; export default DomainDetailScreen;
